CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 33, reads: "Work, Walt! ... and work he did. The Walt Harper Combo kicked in a bevy of bouncy numbers for viewers and listeners to the Courier Home Service Fair at Hunt Armory last week.  The groovy bunch is appearing nightly and breaking records at Crawford Grill Two.  Left to right are John Morris, Nate Harper, Maestro Walt, Billy Lewis and cool Harold Lee. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Walt Harper's jazz band performing with Jon Morris on trombone, Nate Harper on saxophone, Walt Harper on piano, Bill Lewis on bass, and Harold "Brushes" Lee on drums, on raised stage in Crawford Grill No. 2
